dialog.teller: Hello. The image is half blue sky with clouds, half deep green grassy field.
dialog.drawer: Hi, are the clouds large or small, and how many?

dialog.teller: three masses. One top left, one halfway down the frame, one on the right one third of the way from the top of the photo
dialog.drawer: alright, I finished that. Is there any vegetation such as trees or bushes?

dialog.teller: nice. grass is deep green and there is a cluster of little trees on right side of the frame
trees are farther back along the horizon and come over until halfway through frame
dialog.drawer: is the mass of trees larger or bigger. the tree tool is not very intuitive
